label: ham
subject: News & Views | 06.25.07
body: 35 (return) [ Lactantius, iv. 8. Yet the _Probole_, or _Prolatio_, which the most orthodox divines borrowed without scruple from the Valentinians, and illustrated by the comparisons of a fountain and stream, the sun and its rays, &c., either meant nothing, or favored a material idea of the divine generation. See Beausobre, tom. i. l. iii. c. 7, p. 548.]
